remarks: The composition of two trace-preserving endomorphisms (multiplication in the endormorphism ring) is a trace-preserving endomorphism. (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2013.)
statement:
tendoco.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendoco.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendococl $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ S e. E /\ T e. E ) -> ( S o. T ) e. E ) $.
